programme.desc: An unwitting American tourist named Frank finds himself in the midst of an intense pursuit that involves various European police forces and a gang of Belarusians among other parties. A seemingly minor error causes Frank to be mistaken for a man wanted by law authorities and mafia men alike.(n)

programme.title: The Commuter
programme.desc: A former cop's commute takes a dark turn when his wife's life is held as leverage against him identifying a mysterious passenger on the train he is on. With time running out, the stakes have never been so high as he is drawn into a complex conspiracy with a deadly outcome.(n)

programme.title: In Time
programme.desc: In the future, old age stops at 25 and everyone must provide more time for themselves for a longer life. Time replaces money, which makes the rich trade it and possess many centuries that almost guarantee their immortality,while the poor has only a few minutes after reaching the age of 25.(n)

programme.title: Top Gun
programme.desc: The Naval Fighter Weapons School witnesses a fierce competition between two students, nicknamed Maverick and Iceman, as they try to win the school's top trophy.(n)

programme.title: Sicario
programme.desc: In the border stretching between Mexico and the U.S.A, an area that has been always out of the reach of law, an idealistic FBI agent is assigned to aid in the escalating war against the cartel.(n)

programme.title: Central Intelligence
programme.desc: Accountant Calvin Joyner and Bob Stone ,are old schoolmates who reconnect through Facebook. But Calvin suddenly finds himself lured into the world of espionage and collecting information with its various dangers.(n)

programme.title: 2 Guns
programme.desc: A DEA agent (Denzel Washington) and a naval intelligence officer (Mark Wahlberg) find themselves on the run after a botched attempt to infiltrate a drug cartel. While fleeing, they learn the secret of their shaky alliance: Neither knew that the other was an undercover agent.(n)

programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: The Irish lady, Deirdre, forms a team of specialized mercenaries to retrieve a mysterious suitcase from dangerous criminals. After they successfully complete the mission, the suitcase gets switched by a member of the team who wants to sell it to the Russians.(n)

programme.title: Top Gun
programme.desc: The Naval Fighter Weapons School witnesses a fierce competition between two students, nicknamed Maverick and Iceman, as they try to win the school's top trophy.(n)

programme.title: Sicario

programme.title: Central Intelligence
programme.desc: Accountant Calvin Joyner and Bob Stone ,are old schoolmates who reconnect through Facebook. But Calvin suddenly finds himself lured into the world of espionage and collecting information with its various dangers.(n)

programme.title: The Tourist
programme.desc: An unwitting American tourist named Frank finds himself in the midst of an intense pursuit that involves various European police forces and a gang of Belarusians among other parties. A seemingly minor error causes Frank to be mistaken for a man wanted by law authorities and mafia men alike.(n)

programme.title: The Commuter
programme.desc: A former cop's commute takes a dark turn when his wife's life is held as leverage against him identifying a mysterious passenger on the train he is on. With time running out, the stakes have never been so high as he is drawn into a complex conspiracy with a deadly outcome.(n)

programme.title: In Time

Time replaces money, which makes the rich trade it and possess many centuries that almost guarantee their immortality,while the poor has only a few minutes after reaching the age of 25.(n)

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious
programme.desc: Cop Brian O'Conner is assigned with stopping a group of car-hijackers led by Dominic Toretto. However, he gets enamored with the street-racing society, and he has to decide where does his loyalty lie.(n)

programme.title: Bleeding Steel
programme.desc: A mission to protect a young woman from an evil gang turns into something more when Special Forces agent Lin learns that his missing daughter has become the recipient of a bio-chemical invention, sending him on a quest that uncovers a wider conspiracy.(n)

programme.title: Stargate
programme.desc: A teleportation device is found in Egypt, and Scientist Daniel discovers that it transmits him to another planet where humans resemble the ancient Egyptians who worship the God Ra.(n)

programme.title: I, Robot
programme.desc: In the distant future, robots are created to help humans with their daily tasks. Detective Del Spooner begins to investigate the murder of a leading robotics scientist and discovers that a robot named Sonny is involved. He has to protect the fate of humans, and reconcile between them and the robots.(n)

programme.title: True Lies
programme.desc: Harry Tasker lives a double life. At work ,he's a government agent with powers to do what he likes. At home, he's a computer salesman. Harry traces a stolen nuclear weapon in the hands of a fanatical terrorist group, while deciding to offer his wife an exciting adventure she never dreamed of.(n)

programme.title: Logan
programme.desc: With mutants nearly extinct, Logan struggles not to give in to despair with his friends dead and his mentor fading before his very eyes. But when he is recruited to get a young mutant to safety, he has to pull himself together to protect that young girl who shares an unexpected connection with him.(n)

programme.title: Army of Darkness
programme.desc: When a hardware store clerk is accidentally transported to the medieval days and captured by Lord Arthur, he is tasked with retrieving the Book of the Dead, as he embarks on a most perilous journey to get the Necronomicon that would help the person who has it get a fearsome army of ghouls.(n)

programme.title: Sin City: A Dame to Kill For
programme.desc: Eva Lord (Eva Green) asks her ex-boyfriend Dwight (Josh Brolin) to help her escape her violent rich husband Damien Lord. But Dwight soon discovers that Eva's intention is full of evil and hatred. On the other hand, John Harrington (Bruce Willis) meets Nancy (Jessica Alba) and events escalate.(n)

programme.title: Spy Game
programme.desc: CIA operative Tom Bishop asks the retired Nathan Muir to help him when he is arrested in China. While on this mission, Nathan recalls all the situations that affected his and Tom's relationship.(n)

programme.title: Need for Speed
programme.desc: After being imprisoned for a crime he didn't commit, a street racer joins a cross-country race with a plan for revenge. When his ex-partner learns of his intentions, he places a bounty on his head as the race starts.(n)

programme.title: In the House
programme.desc: The story of a high school teacher who gets drawn into a world of stories one of his students writes about the family of another student, often crossing the line to secret territories.

programme.title: Il paradiso delle signore
programme.desc: The story of a poor girl from southern Italy who comes to Milan to escape from her cheating fiancé. She finds a job as a sales representative in a store, but quickly gets into trouble with her manager.

programme.title: King Arthur
programme.desc: The film revolves around the history and politics of the reign of King Arthur, during the collapse of the Roman Empire, the outbreak of skirmishes over power in countries far from the empire, and the role of the Knights of the Round Table.

programme.title: Big Momma's House
programme.desc: When a charming woman and her son are in danger of robbery, an FBI agent goes undercover as an overweight grandmother to help keep them safe by staying in the same house.

programme.title: Remember Me
programme.desc: In the wake of his brother's suicide, Tyler's family splinters off under the pressure of their trauma. When he meets Ally, they find solace for their individual familial troubles in each other's arms. Love is born amid tragedy as both Ally and Tyler change each other's lives.(n)

programme.title: Misery
programme.desc: When the famous novelist Paul Sheldon has an accident, his life spirals out of control. Nurse Annie Wilkes takes him to her remote house, but Sheldon gradually discovers that she is an obsessed fan of his works, and she is only torturing him slowly to get him to write her stories.(n)

programme.desc: The film follows a romance between Bella Swan (a teenage girl) and Edward Cullen (a vampire), and the subsequent efforts of Cullen and his family to keep Swan safe from a coven of evil vampires.(n)

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 1
programme.desc: Bella marries vampire Edward, and quickly finds out that she's pregnant. The Wolf Pack find out, and insist on killing her and her child, but Jacob decides to protect Bella. When Bella gives birth to her daughter, Edward turns her into a vampire, and when the Volturi finds out about the child, they decide to take her at any cost.(n)

programme.title: Terminator: Dark Fate
programme.desc: Sarah Connor’s mission is to protect a young woman called Dani Ramos and her friends from the deadly plan of a liquid metal terminator who has arrived from the future by Skynet especially for them. Sarah also recruits the original Terminator to come to their aid for a fight for the future.(n)

programme.title: Kingsman: The Golden Circle
programme.desc: With the Kingsman agents adrift after the destruction of their headquarters, they find an ally in an American organization that resembles their own. The agents of both organizations rally and combine their expertise to take down a common enemy that poses a threat to the entire world.(n)

programme.title: Il paradiso delle signore
programme.desc: The story of a poor girl from southern Italy who comes to Milan to escape from her cheating fiancé. She finds a job as a sales representative in a store, but quickly gets into trouble with her manager.(n)

Sarah also recruits the original Terminator to come to their aid for a fight for the future.(n)

programme.title: Pinocchio
programme.desc: When an inventor's wish to have the wooden marionette he carved to be his substitute son come to life is granted by a fairy, Pinocchio the marionette must prove that he is brave, truthful and unselfish to earn the right to be a real boy, with the help of Jiminy Cricket who acts as his conscience.(n)

programme.title: Rain Man
programme.desc: When his father dies, Charlie is shocked when he discovers that he left his fortune to Charlie's autistic savant older brother whom he never knew about. Desperate to get his father's inheritance, Charlie kidnaps Raymond and takes him on a cross-country trip to convince him to give up his inheritance.

programme.title: Hell or High Water
programme.desc: A divorced father and his ex-con brother start a series of bank robberies to keep their family's ranch in West Texas, while two Texas Rangers try to catch them.

programme.title: Walk of Shame
programme.desc: After a hard day, a reporter tries to get out of her funk by going out drinking and having a one-night-stand. But the next morning, she finds that this night of fun may jeopardize her lifelong dream as she gets stranded with no way to go to the most important job interview of her life.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: As Curtis tries to make it as a music manager, he provides a career change for a girls' band that consists of three soul singers. But as he tries to make the band into headliner material, he ends up demoting then firing the lead singer to replace her with another whom he deems more fit for stardom.

programme.title: Gold
programme.desc: Based on a true story, the movie revolves around Kenny Wells and Michael Acosta, two friends who set off on an adventure in the uncharted jungle of Indonesia in the hopes of finding gold.

programme.title: Lions for Lambs
programme.desc: Three parallel stories that take place in 90 minutes: an ambitious Republican Senator hopeful of presidential candidacy is conducting an hour-long television interview, while a university professor tries to motivate one of his students. At the same time, an army soldier is facing certain death in Afghanistan.

programme.title: Grace of Monaco
programme.desc: The biopic of Hollywood starlet Grace Kelly, who married Prince Rainier III of Monaco in April 1956. The film tracks a particularly trying time, during a political dispute in the 1960s between Rainier and French President Charles De Gaulle.

programme.title: Malcolm X
programme.desc: A biography of the African-American Muslim minister and human rights activist Malcolm X, who started his life as a gangster before converting to Islam and finally getting assassinated in 1965.

programme.title: The Count of Monte Cristo
programme.desc: Dantes is falsely accused by his best friend Fernand and is imprisoned in an island prison for 13 years. Dantes escapes and transforms himself into a rich count and dreams of only one thing: revenge.

programme.title: 25th Hour
programme.desc: After a drug dealer is convicted and cornered by the DEA in New York, (Montgomery Brogan) re-evaluates his life in the remaining 24 hours before facing a seven-year sentence.

programme.title: Pawn Sacrifice
programme.desc: During the Cold War era between the US and the former Soviet Union, the true story of the legendary American chess player Bobby Fischer (Toby Maguire), and the circumstances of his confrontation with his Russian counterpart Boris Spassky (Liev Schreiber) in a high level game of chess.

programme.title: Green Book
programme.desc: In 1962, Tony "Tony Lip” (Viggo Mortensen), an Italian-American tough bouncer, is hired to be the driver for the African-American classical pianist Dr. Don Shirley (Mahershala Ali) for a concert tour into the Deep South states. Because of America's racial segregation, Shirley relies on The Negro Motorist Green Book to guide them to small hotels, restaurants and gas stations. As the disparate pair witness and endure America's appalling injustices on the road, they find a newfound respect for each that opens their eyes to the world around them.

programme.title: Papillon
programme.desc: In the wake of a wrongful murder conviction, Henry is sent to a remote penitentiary colony. Once there, he soon comes to bond with another inmate, Louis Dega. Together, they plan for their escape.

programme.title: 25th Hour
programme.desc: After a drug dealer is convicted and cornered by the DEA in New York, (Montgomery Brogan) re-evaluates his life in the remaining 24 hours before facing a seven-year sentence.

programme.title: Pawn Sacrifice
programme.desc: During the Cold War era between the US and the former Soviet Union, the true story of the legendary American chess player Bobby Fischer (Toby Maguire), and the circumstances of his confrontation with his Russian counterpart Boris Spassky (Liev Schreiber) in a high level game of chess.

programme.title: Malcolm X
programme.desc: A biography of the African-American Muslim minister and human rights activist Malcolm X, who started his life as a gangster before converting to Islam and finally getting assassinated in 1965.(n)

programme.title: The Count of Monte Cristo
programme.desc: Dantes is falsely accused by his best friend Fernand and is imprisoned in an island prison for 13 years. Dantes escapes and transforms himself into a rich count and dreams of only one thing: revenge.(n)

programme.title: The Founder
programme.desc: The true story of how one man, Ray Kroc, turned a burger joint into one of the biggest food-chains in the world, turning McDonald's from a small, albeit popular, walk-up restaurant run by the brothers Mac and Dick McDonald into a franchise worth billions.(n)

programme.title: DragonHeart
programme.desc: After inadvertently granting King Einon immortality when he gives him a piece of his heart to heal him, the dragon Draco joins forces with Einon's former mentor, the knight Bowen, as they seek to put an end to Einon's reign of terror as the tyrant king rules his kingdom with fire and blood.(n)

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: Armed with a technology that enables him to enter people's dreams and get access to their subconscious, Dom is hired to carry out a complicated task: set up the perfect circumstances to plant an idea in the mind of a businessman in the dream world.(n)

programme.title: Alone in Berlin
programme.desc: When their only son is killed in battle during WWII, the German couple Otto and Anna decide to resist the Nazi regime by writing postcards to urge people to protest against their government.(n)

programme.title: Bohemian Rhapsody
programme.desc: The story behind the song (Bohemian Rhapsody) written by Freddie Mercury and sung by the English rock band Queen, where Freddie was a member of the band. The film documents the events of the years that led Queen to their legendary appearance at the Live Aid concert in 1985.(n)

programme.title: Troy
programme.desc: The film depicts the epic of the Iliad, which tells the story of the siege of the city of Troy, where (Achilles) led a Trojan war for ten years,during which a fight between him and (Agamemnon) took place.(n)

programme.title: Alexander
programme.desc: The true story of Alexander the Great's conquests and the unprecedented military feat of conquering 90% of the known world by the age of 27, as well as his relationship with his childhood friend Hephaistionand his wife Roxane.(n)

programme.title: The Age of Adaline
programme.desc: Adaline Bowman (Blake Lively) is born in the early 1920s. After an accident, she becomes ageless. She remains 29 years old for eight decades, and after years of isolation, she meets a man who rekindles her passion for life. She spends a weekend with his parents, and finds her secret threatened.(n)

programme.title: Jobs
programme.desc: The extraordinary story of Steve Jobs: from college dropout to Apple founder, entrepreneur, and creator of one of the most widespread devices of the 21st century, the iPhone.(n)

programme.title: After the Wedding
programme.desc: Isabel runs an orphanage in the Indian city of Kolkata, but she desperately needs money to keep the shelter in place, she travels to New York City to meet a benefactor who might help her with funding.(n)

programme.title: Big
programme.desc: When thirteen-year-old Josh Baskin makes a wish to be 'big' to impress an older girl, he finds his wish granted as he's left to adjust to being a little boy in a grown man's body.(n)

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: In the wake of a deadly martian storm, a space crew leaves one of their own behind, mistakenly believing him to be dead, only it turns out the astronaut is still alive. With little resources and limited supplies, he struggles to find means of survival and let those on Earth know of his presence.(n)

programme.title: Dark Waters
programme.desc: The true story of how one man stood up against a major corporation after the latter is connected to a number of deaths. Filing a lawsuit against the company, he faces a tremendous amount of pressure as he tries to put a stop to their practices that pollute the environment.(n)

programme.title: The Sixth Sense
programme.desc: Child psychologist, Dr. Malcolm Crowe, sees a boy with a strange case: he receives visitations from ghosts who had unresolved traumas while alive. The mother consults the doctor to treat her son, but what if her son isn't really sick and what he sees bears truth to it.(n)

programme.title: Unbreakable
programme.desc: David Dunn is the sole survivor of a horrific train-crash that killed 131 people. An obscure character approaches Dunn as he thinks he has something extraordinary about him.(n)

programme.title: Allied
programme.desc: In 1942 during World War II, Canadian intelligence officer, Max Vatan, is partnered with French Resistance fighter, Marianne Beausejour, in an assasination mission in Casablanca. They fall in love and get married in London after which Max is confronted with an allegation from his superiors that Marianne is a German spy and if proved to be true, Max must execute her. Defying the set plan, Max decides to find out the truth about his wife on his own and endangers his life and those who try to help him in the process.(n)

programme.title: The Grey
programme.desc: In the North Pole within dramatic events, an oil drilling team faces harsh conditions and predatory wolves after their plane crash.(n)

programme.title: Unbreakable
programme.desc: David Dunn is the sole survivor of a horrific train-crash that killed 131 people. An obscure character approaches Dunn as he thinks he has something extraordinary about him.(n)

programme.title: Dream House Nightmare
programme.desc: What was supposed to be a lucky purchase for a married couple turns into a nightmare when they discover that their dream house is coveted by an unstable woman who is willing to do anything to force them out.(n)

programme.title: Big
programme.desc: When thirteen-year-old Josh Baskin makes a wish to be 'big' to impress an older girl, he finds his wish granted as he's left to adjust to being a little boy in a grown man's body.(n)

programme.title: Barry S1
programme.desc: When the hitman Barry Berkman travels to Los Angeles on a job to kill an actor, things take a surprising turn when he becomes drawn to the theatre scene, as he befriends a group of aspiring actors who are taking acting classes.

programme.title: Curb Your Enthusiasm S10
programme.desc: At the beginning of the new year, Larry David is exposed again to a series of strange situations that gradually complicate his life and affect his career and personal life.

programme.title: Search Party S2
programme.desc: After Chantal is found, and Keith is killed, the gang faces a daunting task of trying to bury a body before sunrise.

programme.title: Avenue 5 S1
programme.desc: Captain Ryan Clark and his crew try to keep the passengers of their luxury spaceship calm and happy while they try to deal with the ramifications of how technical difficulties have sent them off-course with supplies that will only last them a month.

programme.title: Vice Principals
programme.desc: When the principal is due to step down, a fierce competition between the popular vice principal and an over-protective father who eagerly wants to become vice-principal takes place, only for unforeseen circumstances to prompt them to work together.
